content.metaTitle: Villa MIR0156: New Build Villa Jávea/Xàbia - Sea Views
content.metaDescription: Luxury 4-bedroom Villa MIR0156 in Balcón al Mar, Jávea. Modern Ibizan design, sea views, 1548m² plot. €1,995,000. Prime Costa Blanca location near beaches.
content.heroIntro:
Discover Villa MIR0156, an exceptional new build villa in the coveted Balcón al Mar area of Jávea/Xàbia, where contemporary Ibizan architecture meets Mediterranean luxury. This stunning 4-bedroom, 4-bathroom residence sits majestically on a generous 1,548m² plot, offering uninterrupted sea views from every room and creating an atmosphere of pure tranquility just moments from Spain's most pristine beaches including Portichol and the world-renowned Granadella.

Crafted by renowned developer Miralbo Urbana S.L., this turnkey property exemplifies modern Costa Blanca living with its sophisticated design, premium finishes, and seamless indoor-outdoor flow. The villa's strategic positioning in this exclusive residential enclave ensures complete privacy while maintaining convenient access to Jávea's finest restaurants, international schools, and vibrant town center, making it the perfect sanctuary for discerning buyers seeking the ultimate Mediterranean lifestyle.

locationSection.intro:
Balcón al Mar in Jávea/Xàbia represents the pinnacle of Costa Blanca coastal living, renowned for its elevated position offering panoramic Mediterranean vistas and proximity to some of Europe's most spectacular beaches. This exclusive residential area combines the tranquility of a natural setting with sophisticated infrastructure, positioning residents within easy reach of Portichol's intimate cove and the crystalline waters of Granadella Beach, consistently ranked among Spain's most beautiful coastal destinations.

Jávea/Xàbia itself is celebrated as the jewel of the Costa Blanca, where traditional Spanish charm harmoniously blends with international sophistication. The town's unique microclimate, protected by the Montgó Natural Park, ensures over 300 days of sunshine annually, while its diverse landscape encompasses pristine beaches, dramatic cliffs, and lush Mediterranean vegetation, creating an unparalleled quality of life that attracts discerning residents from across Europe.
highlights: Walking distance to Portichol Beach and 5 minutes to world-famous Granadella Beach
Elevated position in exclusive Balcón al Mar with panoramic sea views
Close proximity to prestigious international schools including Lady Elizabeth School
Easy access to Jávea's historic old town and bustling Arenal beachfront
Surrounded by protected natural areas and hiking trails in Montgó Natural Park

propertyFeatures.intro: Villa MIR0156 showcases contemporary Mediterranean architecture at its finest, featuring clean Ibizan-style lines, premium materials, and intelligent spatial design across 190m² of thoughtfully planned living space. Every detail has been meticulously considered to maximize the spectacular sea views while creating seamless transitions between indoor and outdoor living areas.
features: 4 spacious en-suite bedrooms, each with private bathroom and sea views
Open-plan designer kitchen and living area with floor-to-ceiling windows
Expansive 1,548m² plot with mature Mediterranean landscaping
Elegant infinity-style swimming pool with integrated chill-out area
Premium finishes and modern technology throughout
Multiple outdoor terraces and garden seating areas
Uninterrupted sea views from all principal rooms
Energy-efficient design with latest smart home technology
Turnkey delivery with sophisticated furnishing package

content.investmentSection:
Villa MIR0156 represents an exceptional investment opportunity in one of Costa Blanca's most sought-after markets. Jávea/Xàbia consistently demonstrates strong property value appreciation, with luxury villas in prime locations like Balcón al Mar showing average annual growth of 5-8%. The area's limited supply of new build properties, combined with increasing international demand, particularly from Northern European buyers seeking premium Spanish coastal properties, creates a robust investment foundation with excellent long-term potential.

The villa's rental potential is equally impressive, with luxury properties in this exclusive area commanding premium rates throughout the year. Proximity to Granadella and Portichol beaches, combined with the property's sophisticated amenities and sea views, positions it perfectly for the high-end vacation rental market, with potential gross yields of 6-8% annually. The growing trend toward remote working has further increased demand for luxury long-term rentals, providing investors with flexible income strategies in one of Europe's most desirable residential destinations.

faqs.question: What is the total price for Villa MIR0156 and what payment terms are available?
faqs.answer: Villa MIR0156 is priced at €1,995,000 for turnkey delivery. Miralbo Urbana S.L. typically offers flexible payment schedules for new build properties, with options for staged payments during construction. We can arrange a personalized payment plan discussion with the developer to suit your financial requirements.

faqs.question: How close is the villa to beaches and what makes this Jávea location special?
faqs.answer: The villa is within walking distance of Portichol Beach and just 5 minutes from the world-famous Granadella Beach. This Balcón al Mar location is highly coveted for its elevated position offering panoramic sea views, proximity to pristine beaches, and easy access to Jávea's international schools and restaurants.

faqs.question: Can you help arrange mortgage financing for this Spanish property purchase?
faqs.answer: Yes, we partner with Habeno, Spanish mortgage specialists who can arrange financing for international buyers purchasing in Spain. Spanish banks typically offer mortgages up to 70% of property value for non-residents, with competitive rates for luxury properties like Villa MIR0156.

faqs.question: What is the rental potential for this villa in Jávea?
faqs.answer: Luxury villas in this prime Jávea location command excellent rental rates, particularly given the sea views and proximity to Granadella Beach. Properties of this caliber typically achieve gross rental yields of 6-8% annually, with peak season rates reaching €3,000-4,000 per week for short-term luxury rentals.

faqs.question: When will Villa MIR0156 be completed and available for occupation?
faqs.answer: As this is a new build project by Miralbo Urbana S.L., completion timelines depend on the construction phase. We can provide current completion estimates and construction progress updates directly from the developer. Typical delivery timeframes for properties of this specification range from 12-18 months from contract signing.

faqs.question: What is included in the turnkey delivery of Villa MIR0156?
faqs.answer: The turnkey delivery includes premium modern furnishings, fully equipped designer kitchen, bathroom fittings, air conditioning throughout, swimming pool, landscaped gardens, and all modern technology installations. The property will be delivered ready for immediate occupation with sophisticated finishes throughout.

faqs.question: What are the ongoing costs of owning this villa in Spain?
faqs.answer: Annual costs include Spanish property tax (IBI), community fees if applicable, insurance, and utilities. For a property of this value, expect annual IBI of approximately €3,000-4,000, plus maintenance costs for pool and gardens. We can provide detailed annual cost projections upon request.

faqs.question: How can I arrange a viewing of Villa MIR0156?
faqs.answer: We can arrange property viewings, including virtual tours if you're unable to visit in person initially. Contact us via WhatsApp or phone to schedule a convenient viewing time with our local Jávea property specialists who can show you the site and surrounding area.

content.conclusion: Villa MIR0156 represents a rare opportunity to secure a premium new build villa in one of Costa Blanca's most prestigious locations, where luxury living meets exceptional investment potential. Don't miss your chance to own this magnificent sea-view property in Balcón al Mar, Jávea – contact us today via WhatsApp at +34 634 044 970 to arrange your private viewing and begin your journey to Mediterranean luxury living.
